item.title: Search for a String in Multiple Files
item.description: In support of an earlier post Fetching NHL Play by Play game data, I was recently asked how could one quickly search for a specific string in multiple JSON files recursively? Well if you are running macOS or Linux grep is your best friend! In a nutshell grep prints lines that contain a match for a pattern. The following is a sample grep and cut command that will list out (output) the games (files) that contains the following string -> “Montréal Canadiens”:
